SilentFinal.DESCRIPTION: A standing ovation is the finest compliment that an audience can offer when they listened to a marvelous piece.

Duel.NAME: Duel!
Duel.DESCRIPTION: The ones who know the cruelty of winter and the aroma of rose.

GuardApostle.NAME: Guard Apostle
GuardApostle.DESCRIPTION: While this card and WhiteNight are together in your hand, Exhaust all non-Sacred cards you play. Exhaust.

ScytheApostle.NAME: Scythe Apostle
ScytheApostle.DESCRIPTION: If this card is in your hand at the end of the turn, Exhaust all non-Sacred cards. Exhaust.

WandApostle.NAME: Wand Apostle
WandApostle.DESCRIPTION: While this card is in your hand, Exhaust all non-Sacred Skills you play. Exhaust.

SpearApostle.NAME: Spear Apostle
SpearApostle.DESCRIPTION: While this card is in your hand, Exhaust all non-Sacred Attacks you play. Exhaust.

HereticApostle.NAME: The Heretic
HereticApostle.DESCRIPTION: Have I not chosen you, the Twelve? Yet one of you is a devil.

WorkerBee.NAME: Worker Bee
WorkerBee.DESCRIPTION: If this card is in your hand at the end of the turn, Exhaust a random card in your hand. Exhaust.

Sheep.NAME: Sheepskin
Sheep.DESCRIPTION: ...That’s why I could slash the wolf’s belly and returned safely back here!

PrinceOne.NAME: Little Prince-1
PrinceOne.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: Deal 5 damage to yourself. Exhaust.

Elijah.NAME: Elijah
Elijah.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: Exhaust a random card. While this card is in your hand, each time you deal damage to an enemy, deal the same amount to yourself. Exhaust.

BlackArmyDerive.NAME: Army in Black
BlackArmyDerive.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: Deal 10 damage to yourself. Exhaust.

MeltingSlime.NAME: Slime
MeltingSlime.DESCRIPTION: All enemies heal !M! HP. Exhaust. Uncontrollable: Deal 2 damage to yourself.

Apo_Beam.NAME: Dark Beam
Apo_Beam.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. Enemy loses !D! HP and gains !M! Vulnerable.

Apo_Execute.NAME: Execute
Apo_Execute.DESCRIPTION: Deal 999 damage. Only usable against enemies with lower than 100 HP.

Apo_SoulSlash.NAME: Soul Slash
Apo_SoulSlash.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !D! HP, and loses equal amount of max HP. Repeat this effect once.

Apo_Pray.NAME: Pray
Apo_Pray.DESCRIPTION: Heal to max HP. This card is removed from your deck after playing it.

SpAim.NAME: MP Recovery Bullet
SpAim.DESCRIPTION: Remove a random debuff from yourself..

ExecuteAim.NAME: Execution Bullet
ExecuteAim.DESCRIPTION: Deal 999 damage. Only usable against enemies lower than !D! HP. Erase.

Malkuth.NAME: Control Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: TT2 Protocol
Add *TT2 *Protocol into your deck.
Joint Command
Control Team order now allows the selection of cards in draw and discard piles.
Summon Call
Add *Summon *Call into your deck.
Core Suppression
Gain [E] at the start of each turn..

Yesod.NAME: Information Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: G.O Visualization
Displays health and status.
Normalization of Damage
Displays enemy intents.
Abnormality Countermeasure Manual
Whenever you add an Abnormality card into your deck, increase your max HP by 4.
Core Suppression
All enemies have 25% less HP.

Netzach.NAME: Security Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Regenerating Mk2
Increase the healing power of Security Team order.
Mental Corruption Neutralizing Gas
When Security Team order triggers, remove a random Curse from your deck.
Regenerator Distinguisher Modification
Security Team order now heals a small amount of HP at the end of each turn.
Core Suppression
If you have Security Team order in your deck, whenever you climb a floor, heal a small amount of HP.

Hod.NAME: Training Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Supply Educational Manuals
At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
Reinforce Work Education
Training Team order now allows the selection of cards in draw and discard piles.
Reinforce Hiring Procedure
At the start of combat, gain an additional 2 Strength and Dexterity.
Core Suppression
Your damage and block values are increased by 25% for all combats.

Tiphereth.NAME: Central Command Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Physical Intervention Shield
Unlock Physical Intervention Shield.
Trauma Shield
Unlock Trauma Shield.
Erosion Shield
Unlock Erosion Shield.
Core Suppression
Unlock Pale Shield.

Chesed.NAME: Welfare Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: HP-N Bullet
Unlock HP-N Bullet.
SP-E Bullet
Unlock SP-E Bullet.
Refine HP, SP Bullet
Increase the healing power of HP-N Bullet by 2. SP-E Bullet now allows you to Exhaust a card.
Core Suppression
At the start of each turn, you may add a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

Geburah.NAME: Disciplinary Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Qliphoth Intervention Field
Unlock Qliphoth Intervention Field.
Execution Bullet
Unlock Execution Bullet.
Rabbit Team
Unlock 2 extra deployments of Rabbit Team.
Core Suppression
At the start of each turn, you may choose to cause your first Attack/Skill/Power to be played twice this turn.
This turn, your next Power is played twice.

Hokma.NAME: Record Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Virtue of Protection
Gain an additional potion slot.

Gold gained upon winning combats is increased by 50%.
Virtue of Creation
Gain an additional card reward in rewards screens.
Core Suppression

Binah.NAME: Extraction Team
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: E.G.O. Restoration
You have 1 additional card to select from in Card Reward screens.
Re-extraction
Unlocks the re-extraction ability.
GIFT Division
If you have "Bucket", all cards in Card Reward screens are upgraded.
Core Suppression
If you have "Bucket", whenever you add or remove a card from your deck, gain 25 Gold.

ControlCode.NAME: Control Team order
ControlCode.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards in your hand and reduce their costs by [E] this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards and reduce their costs by [E] this turn.

InformationCode.NAME: Information Team
InformationCode.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. You may discard any of them.

SecurityCode.NAME: Security Team order
SecurityCode.DESCRIPTION: If this card is still in your deck at the end of combat, heal !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If this card is still in your deck at the end of combat, heal !M! HP and removes a random Curse from your deck.

If this card is still in your deck at the end of combat, heal !M! HP and removes a random Curse from your deck. If this card is still in your deck at the end of the turn, heal for 25% of its healing power.

TrainingCode.NAME: Training Team order
TrainingCode.DESCRIPTION: Select up to !M! cards in your hand and upgrade them.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select up to !M! cards and upgrade them.

CentralCode.NAME: Central Command Team order
CentralCode.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Bullets. Gain !B! Block for each Bullet discarded this way.

DisciplinaryCode.NAME: Disciplinary Team order
DisciplinaryCode.DESCRIPTION: Select up to !M! cards (not limited to hand) and Exhaust them. Exhaust.

RecordCode.NAME: Record Team order
RecordCode.DESCRIPTION: Select up to !M! cards in your Exhaust pile and add them to your hand.

ExtractionCode.NAME: Extraction Team order
ExtractionCode.DESCRIPTION: Gain an additional card reward upon winning the combat. Remove this card from combat after playing it.

TT2Protocol.NAME: TT2 Protocol
TT2Protocol.DESCRIPTION: Play your entire hand from left to right at random targets.

ExpandDepartment.NAME: Expand Department
ExpandDepartment.DESCRIPTION: Consumes 5 LP. Select a department to expand.

FourthMatchFlame.NAME: Fourth Match Flame
FourthMatchFlame.DESCRIPTION: If this card is Exhausted, deal !D! damage to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The fire will not go out until it has burned away the happiness, warmth, and other good things of the world.

Penitence.NAME: Penitence
Penitence.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to half of your missing HP (gains !B! block).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The thorns hurt as they anchor your soul in reality.

InTheNameOfLoveAndHate.NAME: In the Name of Love and Hate
InTheNameOfLoveAndHate.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack and you have no Block, gain !B! Block. Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I made my mind to love everything in the world, but what’s left is a broken hear.

BearPaw.NAME: Bear Paw
BearPaw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is discarded, gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Its warm memory of hugs was forgotten when it was thrown away.

BloodyDesire.NAME: Bloody Desire
BloodyDesire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. If you do not lose HP before the start of your next turn, lose 6 HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: However, obsession doesn't stop when blinded by avarice.

Loneliness.NAME: Loneliness
Loneliness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Can only be played if it's the only card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: To hide soft inside, arm yourself with loneliness.

ScreamingWedge.NAME: Screaming Wedge
ScreamingWedge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. All enemies lose !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only iron-willed employees can use this without side effects.

Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: You will no longer take damage from Thorns or HP loss.
Mimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. You will no longer take damage from Thorns or HP loss.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Even though it is not the skin of a human, the skin that is akin to it protects us.

Noise.NAME: Noise
Noise.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and randomize their costs between 0 to 3.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: As if taking you to the very moment of the day that everyone forgot.

Harmony.NAME: Harmony
Harmony.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Reduce the cost of this card by [E] for each card Exhausted this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Art is the gift of the devil from despair and suffering.

DaCapo.NAME: Da Capo

Logging.NAME: Logging
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: As if honing the blade was done religiously, the blade is always shiny.

FrostShard.NAME: Frost Shard
FrostShard.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Skill, gain !B! Block and repeat this effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Perhaps a day will come when her heart will be warmed by the weather, if you can believe it.
Intolerable
If Feather Of Honor is drawn this way, Exhaust it.

Lamp.NAME: Lamp
Lamp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, permanently upgrade it. Can be upgraded any number of times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dozens of those burning eyes are always looking toward one place.

GrinderMk4.NAME: Grinder Mk4
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Machine rebellion is no longer a threat in modern society.

GreenStem.NAME: Green Stem
GreenStem.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It sprouted stems and leaves after realizing nobody will come.

RedEyes.NAME: Red Eyes
RedEyes.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Its eyes gaze on targets even in the darkness.

Horn.NAME: Horn
Horn.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP (deals !D! damage).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A flower blossomed through hate that would not wither.

ParadiseLost.NAME: Paradise Lost

Christmas.NAME: Christmas

Hornet.NAME: Hornet
Hornet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have no debuffs, deal twice the damage instead.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The glory of the past still lingers.

WristCuter.NAME: Wrist Cuter
WristCuter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! HP each time it is attacked.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It will also permanently cut off the will to pursue happiness from the victim.

Soda.NAME: Soda
Soda.DESCRIPTION: Every 3 cards you play, heal 1 HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It smells like grapes.

Reverberation.NAME: Reverberation
Reverberation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this card is discarded, gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Any cracks will be filled with a pile of flowers.

Regret_ego.NAME: Regret
Regret_ego.DESCRIPTION: Each time you Exhaust a card, gain 1 Metallicize.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Regret shall be wielded in remembrance of all who died but could not find eternal rest.

Galaxy.NAME: Galaxy
Galaxy.DESCRIPTION: If you have no other Skills, gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The pebble in your hand sparkles, sways, tickles, And it becomes the universe.

Beak.NAME: Beak
Beak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have lost HP this turn, deal an additional 4 times of damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Show no mercy to whomever stands on your way.

CrimsonScar.NAME: Crimson Scar
CrimsonScar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Blue Scar is in your hand, Exhaust it, and deal twice the damage instead.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Attacking in blind rage and without hesitation is more important than insecure courage.

BlueScar.NAME: Blue Scar
BlueScar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If Crimson Scar is in your hand, Exhaust it, and gain twice the Block instead.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The wounds will make you feel dull from damages although it won’t protect you completely from them.

Tough.NAME: Tough
Tough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your draw pile is empty, deal the same amount of damage 2 more times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only those people with bald or round hair loss can use this.

SomewhereSpear.NAME: Somewhere Spear
SomewhereSpear.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn, it gains the effects of a random card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Do not try to understand it, just use it.

LifeForTheDareDevil.NAME: Life For The Dare Devil
LifeForTheDareDevil.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Exhaust all Skills. If this effect Exhausts a Skill, gain !M! Metallicize and Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If a person who accepts their death uses this, any enemy can be defeated.

Justitia.NAME: Justitia
Justitia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Increase the damage value of this card by !M! for each debuff on the battlefield.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Do not try to take off the bandage. It wants to hide the sad memories of the past.

Twilight.NAME: Twilight
Twilight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. Remove this card from this combat after playing it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: In the forest, did the birds twitter stop?

GoldRush.NAME: Gold Rush
GoldRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add this card into your hand at the start of every turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Its beautiful gold patterns have mesmerized many a person. The delusion may have come from the deepest subconscious.

Spore.NAME: Spore
Spore.DESCRIPTION: Discover 1 card. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Spore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discover 1 card. It costs 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nostalgia is more miserable because it is invisible.

Laetitia_ego.NAME: Laetitia
Laetitia_ego.DESCRIPTION: Cards in your hand gain Retain this turn.
Laetitia_ego.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Cards in your hand gain Retain this turn..
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The ribbon on the coat represents a child's yearn for happiness. The kid could not leave her friend behind.

SolemnVow.NAME: Solemn Vow
SolemnVow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each card in your Exhaust pile. Remove all cards from your Exhaust pile. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When you see a shallow grave in the desert, mourn for the butterflies.

MagicBullet.NAME: Magic Bullet
MagicBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Exhaust all cards in your discard pile. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Though unable to fully extract the power of the prototype, the magical power it holds is still potent.

BlackSwan_ego.NAME: Black Swan
BlackSwan_ego.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. Each time you lose HP, reduce the cost of this card by [E]. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It yearned for a never-waking dream, but reality was cruel.

Ecstasy.NAME: Ecstasy
Ecstasy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. Discard 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The colorful pattern makes it look like a fancy kid's vividness.

Heaven.NAME: Heaven
Heaven.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Deal !D! damage to all enemies at the end of the turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It lives inside your eyes.

SwordSharpenedByTears.NAME: Sword Sharpened By Tears
SwordSharpenedByTears.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Skill in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Tears fall like ashes, embroidered like constellations.

ShedSkin.NAME: Shed Skin
ShedSkin.DESCRIPTION: Discard X cards. Gain !M! Plated Armor for each card discarded this way.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Its slippery surface may disturb some people, but its scales are multi-layered, suitable for protection.

TheSmile.NAME: The Smile
TheSmile.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card in your Exhaust pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes you can hear the moaning of pain, but nothing can be done, so it’s better just to ignore it.

Gaze.NAME: Gaze
Gaze.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Gain !B! Block at the end of the turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The eyes behind the door keeps gazing on its target. No one knows what it wants to see.

Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of the combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the wing's adorable form, the E.G.O itself is heavy.

Lantern.NAME: Lantern
Lantern.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !D! damage back.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: However, the teeth that extend from the armor are terrifying.

Harvest.NAME: Harvest
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: How many wise people lost their lives to this rake?

Diffraction.NAME: Diffraction
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can ignore the ridiculous advice that you should see it with your mind.

CENSORED_ego.NAME: (CENSORED)
CENSORED_ego.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain !M! Weak and Vulnerable, and lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (CENSORED) can be (CENSORED) but gives the audience a horrendous feeling.

TodaysExpression.NAME: Todays Expression
TodaysExpression.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your debuffs, and gain !B! Block for each debuff removed (gains !B! Block).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Let's hide your face when you feel like you cannot hide your feelings anymore.

SoundOfStar.NAME: Sound Of Star
SoundOfStar.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to X cards in your hand. Gain [E] equal to the sum of their costs, and draw that many cards. Exhaust.
SoundOfStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to X + 1 cards in your hand. Gain [E] equal to the sum of their costs, and draw that many cards. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you look carefully, you can see that we will have to return someday.

Pleasure.NAME: Pleasure
Pleasure.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak. Draw 2 cards. Add a copy of this card into your hand. Can only be played if there are no other copies of Pleasure in your hand.
Pleasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak. Draw 2 cards. Add a copy of this card into your hand. Can only be played if there are no other copies of Pleasure in your hand. Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you look for a pleasure that can not be tolerated, the end reaches the loss of self.

RapturousDream.NAME: Rapturous Dream
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The thirst is severe when the dawn breaks, I wait for you with my eyes closed. You, who will never come.

CherryBlossom.NAME: Cherry Blossom
CherryBlossom.DESCRIPTION: Each time you Exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I shall return as buds when winter leaves.

FeatherOfHonor.NAME: Feather Of Honor
FeatherOfHonor.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw an Attack, deal !D! damage to all enemies and repeat this effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The flames that pierce the body melts the frozen body and heart.
Intolerable
If Frost Shard is drawn this way, Exhaust it.

Discord.NAME: Discord
Discord.DESCRIPTION: Reverse the costs of all your cards.
Discord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Reverse the costs of all your cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The power of birth, and the power of death. There is no good or evil about those powers. They are just the way it was meant to be.

Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Discord your hand. Deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: In the end, we all become moon. Because we can’t bear ourselves.

Pinks.NAME: Pinks
Pinks.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage and block values of cards in your hand by !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pink is considered to be the color of warmth and love.

CUTE.NAME: CUTE
CUTE.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile at a random enemy. Exhaust.
CUTE.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile at a random enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: But the jelly-like paw pad feels much gud to touch.

Hypocrisy.NAME: Hypocrisy
Hypocrisy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that cost 0.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: But beware that the nature does not know the difference between the blessing and curse.

Adoration.NAME: Adoration
Adoration.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Add 2 copies of it into your hand. Exhaust.
Adoration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add 2 copies of it into your hand. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: People who touch this slime complain strange sensation on their skin. But it won’t stop there.

Amita.NAME: Amita
Amita.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. Gain [E] equal to 3 times its cost. Exhaust.
Amita.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. Gain [E] equal to 3 times its cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can become Buddha by washing away anguish and delusions in your heart. I wanted to believe.

AddBullet.NAME: Buy Bullet
